message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.DL, cs.LG, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with image processing and information retrieval, which are common topics in computer vision (cs.CV) and information retrieval (cs.IR). The use of Local Binary Pattern (LBP) and spatial sampling also suggests a possible connection to deep learning (cs.DL) and machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper may also fall under computational linguistics (cs.CL) due to its focus on word spotting in handwritten documents.
